Shipcrowd Backend Master Plan
12-16 Week CANON-Compliant Implementation Strategy
Generated: December 25, 2025 Project: Shipcrowd - Shipping Aggregator Platform Current Completion: 24% Backend Target: 100% Production-Ready Backend Timeline: 12-16 weeks, Solo Developer (8-10 hours/day) Methodology: CANON AI-Native Development
IMPLEMENTATION PLAN OVERVIEW
This comprehensive master plan will transform Shipcrowd backend from 24% to 100% completion over 12-16 weeks using CANON AI-native methodology.
Key Implementation Decisions
Technology Stack:
Backend: Node.js + TypeScript + Express + MongoDB (existing)
AI/ML: OpenAI API (JavaScript integration, mock key: sk-proj-xxxxx)
Payment: Razorpay SDK only
Courier: Shiprocket Custom API only (12 endpoints)
PDF: PDFKit for labels/invoices/manifests
Cache: Redis for performance
Jobs: Bull for background processing
Testing: Jest + Supertest (existing, 60% â†’ 80%+ coverage)
Refactoring Strategy:
Week 1: Fix race conditions, establish CANON workflow, create context packages
Weeks 2-5: Core operations (courier, payment, documents, warehouse)
Refactor-first approach: Fix existing before adding new
Testing Coverage Targets:
Payment & Courier: 80%+ (critical)
Core Features: 70%+
Support Features: 60%+
All critical paths: 100% integration tests
Detail Levels:
Weeks 1-5 (Phase 1): Fully detailed day-by-day breakdown with code examples, file paths, and task lists
Weeks 6-16 (Phases 2-4): Structured with module outlines, ready for future day-by-day expansion when execution time arrives
PHASE 1: WEEKS 1-5 (DETAILED IMPLEMENTATION)
These weeks have complete day-by-day execution plans with specific tasks, file paths, code examples, and deliverables.
Week 1: Foundation & Refactoring
Week 2: Shiprocket Integration
Week 3: Razorpay Payment Gateway
Week 4: Wallet System + PDF Generation
Week 5: Warehouse Workflows
PHASE 2: WEEKS 6-9 (STRUCTURED FOR FUTURE EXPANSION)
These weeks have detailed module structure, file organization, and integration points. When execution time arrives, expand each week into day-by-day plans following Week 1-5 template.
Week 6-7: E-commerce Integration (Shopify + WooCommerce)
Week 8-9: Advanced NDR/RTO Automation (OpenAI)
PHASE 3: WEEKS 10-12 (STRUCTURED FOR FUTURE EXPANSION)
